description: close-up of a man's face with large expressive eyes and a bowtie under his chin; a row of small buildings are drawn along the right margin of the sheet; select areas are lightly colored in blue, brown, and green
inscription: LLC in plate: 17.u. 18. | LL margin of sheet, in pencil: Dr. Rauert (einmalig!) E.125-II.
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Nov. Porträt 1918
title: November Portrait (Self-Portrait)
